name: Merkury Archive
summary: An RKV file is an archive that contains resource files for games that use the Merkury game engine, primarily Ty the Tasmanian Tiger. It stores game resource files, such as music and sound effects files and models for various elements within the game. Typically, only game modders navigating the files of a game's installation directory looking to alter gameplay will encounter RKV files.
